nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT latest(device_name) AS 'Device Name', latest(src_addr) AS 'Device IP', latest(kentik.snmp.Uptime)/8640000 AS 'Uptime (Days)', latest(SysObjectID) AS 'SysObjectID', latest(entity.type) AS 'NR Entity Type', latest(instrumentation.name) AS 'Ktranslate Profile', latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Update', latest(PollingHealth) AS 'Polling Health', if(latest(PollingHealth) = 'GOOD', '', latest(PollingHealthReason)) AS 'Health Reason'WHERE provider = 'kentik-netbotz'

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.tempSensorValueInt) AS 'C', latest(kentik.snmp.tempSensorValueIntF) AS 'F', latest(tempSensorErrorStatus) AS 'Status' FACET tempSensorLabel AS 'Sensor' WHERE provider = 'kentik-netbotz' LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.humiSensorValueInt) AS 'Relative Humidity %', latest(humiSensorErrorStatus) AS 'Status' FACET humiSensorLabel AS 'Sensor' WHERE provider = 'kentik-netbotz' LIMIT MAX
FROM Metric SELECT latest(doorSwitchSensorValueStr) AS 'Error Message' FACET doorSwitchSensorLabel AS 'Sensor' WHERE provider = 'kentik-netbotz' LIMIT MAX
FROM Metric SELECT latest(otherPortStatus) AS 'Status' FACET otherPortLabel AS 'Sensor' WHERE provider = 'kentik-netbotz' LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT latest(errorCondSeverity) AS 'Severity', latest(errorCondResolved) AS 'Resolved' FACET errorCondId AS 'ID', errorCondTypeId AS 'Type', errorCondSensorId AS 'Sensor', errorCondStartTimeStr AS 'Start Time', errorCondResolvedTimeStr AS 'Resolved Time' WHERE provider = 'kentik-netbotz' LIMIT MAX
FROM Metric SELECT latest(otherStateSensorErrorStatus) AS 'Status', latest(otherStateSensorValueStr) AS 'Value' FACET otherStateSensorLabel AS 'Sensor' WHERE provider = 'kentik-netbotz' LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.dewPointSensorValueInt) AS 'C', latest(kentik.snmp.dewPointSensorValueIntF) AS 'F' FACET dewPointSensorLabel AS 'Sensor' WHERE provider = 'kentik-netbotz' LIMIT MAX
FROM Metric SELECT latest(enclosureStatus) AS 'Status', latest(enclosureErrorStatus) AS 'Errors' FACET enclosureLabel AS 'Sensor' WHERE provider = 'kentik-netbotz' LIMIT MAX
FROM Metric SELECT latest(dinPortStatus) AS 'Status' FACET dinPortId AS 'Sensor' WHERE provider = 'kentik-netbotz' LIMIT MAX
